hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #1# major item.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree MQ Before Spinning Log Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Bombchu Shop#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Nayru's Love#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Bow#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Nayru's Love#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the real Phantom Ganon is bright and loud.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Goron Tunic#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that you're wasting time reading this hint, but I disagree. Talk to me again!

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Goron Tunic#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Second Chest

Shadow Temple MQ Boss Key Chest
